full_summary:
================================

### Solicitation Notice: 3.7 Procurement Specialist

#### Solicitation Details

| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | CB-5246-11479154 |
| **Solicitation Number** | 22-58158 |
| **Amendment Number** | 2 |
| **Publication Date** | May 5, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | May 25, 2023, 2:00 PM EST |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | June 1, 2023 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | May 31, 2024 |

#### Tender Overview

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is seeking the services of a Procurement Specialist resource to provide procurement support for the Knowledge, Information, and Technology Services (KITS) Branch.

The successful bidder will provide expertise in procurement support services, including advising, guiding, and supporting procurement activities of the branch.

#### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland Agreement
*   Canada-United States-Mexico Agreement
*   Canada-Hong Kong Agreement
*   Agreement between Canada and the European Free Trade Association

#### Contact Information

*   **Name:** Janis Bigras
*   **Email:** [Janis.Bigras@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Janis.Bigras@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
*   **Phone:** 1-343-573-4768

#### Tender Documents

Refer to the attached documents for additional information on the solicitation.

[Link to tender documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5246/22-58158_npp_revision-1_e_3.7-procurement-specialist.pdf)  [Link to tender documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5246/22-581
